name: Lux-ray Discord bot
description: A Discord bot that help manage server

PORT.description: Which port should flask run on

TOKEN_ALL.description: Bot token use when run on both `dev` and `production` mode. WILL OVERWRITE OTHER TOKEN SETTINGS

TOKEN_DEV.description: Bot token use when run on `dev` mode.

TOKEN_PROD.description: Bot token use when run on `production` mode.

DB_HOST_DEV.description: Database host uri use when run on `dev` mode.

DB_HOST_PROD.description: Database host uri use when run on `production` mode.

DB_TYPE_DEV.description: Database type use when run on `dev` mode.

DB_TYPE_PROD.description: Database type use when run on `production` mode.
